files.description: EHI (ePHI) Export page - main documentation page listing 23 exportable data sections, two export methods (C-CDA and FHIR bulk), and link to FHIR API documentation

138-page FHIR API documentation PDF covering individual patient queries and Bulk Data Access (18 FHIR resource types as NDJSON). Includes sample responses, endpoint specifications, OAuth2 authorization, and API rate limits. Bulk Data Access section (pages 120-132) directly supports EHI bulk export.
Extracted text from the FHIR API PDF for searchability and analysis
Screenshot of top of EHI export page showing heading, intro text, and list of 23 exportable data sections
Screenshot of bottom of EHI export page showing two export methods (C-CDA single/multi patient + FHIR bulk) and file format table
Screenshot of EndoSoft FHIR landing page with 'Click Here to View FHIR API' button linking to the PDF
